entry.title: After Shave Balm by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 18.00

Post shave moisturizer for men. 

A therapeutic moisturizing treatment specially formulated to soothe and protect skin from shaving irritation and razor burn. Hydrates and nourishes skin as it combats the serious dryness caused by daily shaving. Glycerin and organic silicones combine with soothing aloe and allantoin to renew, calm, and condition skin. Natural healing ingredients such as tea tree oil and cooling menthol further help to reduce shaving irritation.

Usage

  • After shaving, apply a small amount to the face and neck area.
  • Massage in until completely absorbed.
  • Use daily.
  • Alcohol Free.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Cyclomethicone, Glycerin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Benzophenone-4, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Menthol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Polysorbate 80, Tetrasodium EDTA, Triethanolamine, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Green 5 (CI 61570).

    Size

    4 oz. / 120 ml.

entry.title: Herbal Mint Toner by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 18.00

Alcohol-free astringent for men.

Cleanses, hydrates and tones with mild herbal extracts. Antioxidants and vitamins protect against free radicals and cell damage.

FHM Grooming Award

Usage

  • Apply toner to cotton ball and wipe face and neck.
  • Pay special attention to forehead, chin, and sides of nose.
  • Avoid eye areas.
  • For normal to oily skin.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Octoxynol-9, Alanine, Allantoin, Arginine, Benzophenone-4, Betaine, BHT, Buteth-3, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Commiphora Myrrha Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Oil, Glutamic Acid, Glycine, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Lysine, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Methyl Gluceth-20, Niacin, Polysorbate 80, Proline, Propylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Serine, Sodium PCA, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Sorbitol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Threonine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tributyl Citrate, DMDM Hydantoin,Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Methylparaben, Red 33 (CI 17200), Blue 1 (CI 42090).

    Size

    10 oz. / 300 ml.

entry.title: Clarifying Clay Mask by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 18.00

Deep cleansing treatment for men.

Deep cleanses and purifies facial skin for a revitalized complexion. Botanical extracts soothe and supply hydration.
Usage
  • Apply a thin layer over cleansed face and neck, avoiding the eyes.
  • Allow mask to dry for 5 to 10 minutes before removing with warm water.
  • Use weekly.
  • For normal to oily skin.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Kaolin (CI 77004), Bentonite (CI 77004), Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 20, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Hydrastis Canadensis (Golden Seal) Extract, Propylene Glycol, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract, Triethanolamine, DMDM Hydantoin, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

    Size

    4 oz. / 120 ml.

entry.title: Facial Scrub by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 15.00

Exfoliating scrub for men.
Effectively tones, exfoliates, and promotes cell renewal, improving smoothness and revitalizing the complexion.
Usage
  • Massage onto face and neck in a light, circular motion.
  • Rinse well.
  • Use once or twice per week, as needed.
  • For all skin types.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Zea Mays (Corn) Kernel Meal, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder, Lauramide DEA, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Carbomer, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Honey (Mel), Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Propylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Triethanolamine, DMDM Hydantoin, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

    Size

    4 oz. / 120 ml.

entry.title: De Safety Razor by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 60.00

Chrome plated traditional safety razor.

The Double Edge Safety Razor (also called a DE Blade or Safety Razor) is presented with serious wet shavers in mind. DE blades are commonly known as the blade your father or grandfather used. The safety razor was first introduced in the late 18th century as a safer alternative to a cut throat blade. Today, classic style wet shaving is making a resurgence. 

  • MADE IN GERMANY.
  • The blade is packaged in a matte black gift box, with a pack of starter blades and an instructional card.
    		•

entry.title: Exfoliating Body Bar by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 16.00

A luxurious scrubbing bar for men with essence of cedarwood and oakmoss. The hydrating and moisture-rich formula leaves the entire body feeling smooth, clean and refreshed.

Rich-lathering formula effectively exfoliates dead skin cells, with pumice, jojoba meal and crushed olive seed to scrub away dirt and rough patches all over body. Hydrating ingredients wash away impurities from skin without stripping moisture, making it ideal for daily use. Suitable for all skin types.

7 oz /198 g

Ingrediants

Sodium Palm Kernelate, Sodium Palmate, Water, Potassium Palm Kernelate, Palm Kernel Acid, Pumice, Fragrance, Potassium Palmate, Coconut Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Powder, Glycerin, Palm Acid, Sodium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Olea Europaea (Olive) Seed Powder, Yellow 7, Iron Oxides, Green 5.

entry.title: Siskiyou Cabin Spray by Juniper Ridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juniper Ridge
Type: Grooming
Price: 40.00

Pacific Northwest coastal forests in a 2 ounce bottle. Fragrance distilled from plants, conifers, bark, moss, mushrooms, and other things found hiking in the Oregon backcountry.

Crafted in small batches using steam-distillation, enfleurage, tincture, and infusion.

Spray once or twice to bring the backcountry indoors for several hours. Because it's made entirely from real plants and trees, our Cabin Spray will never overstay its welcome.


Our brand look has taken a bold step forward. We've liberated ourselves with style elements that get to the core of our story. The new glass bottles and the external packaging, both of which are covered in the trail paintings of our own Chief Storyteller, Obi Kaufmann, and the wooden cap on each of our Backpacker Colognes and Trail Soaps are hand carved in our Oakland workshop.

Ingredients: Organic sugar cane alcohol; 100% natural fragrance: tree pitch, plant sap/juice, steam-distilled essential oils.

entry.title: Tortoise Pocket Comb by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 16.00

Handcrafted in Switzerland, the Baxter of California combs are produced from high quality cellulose acetate sheets (a natural material derived from cotton and tree pulp cellulose). From cutting to polishing, each comb goes through a detailed 12-step process of manufacturing - all done by hand. With smoothly tapered teeth and rounded tips for comfort, this quality comb is excellent for on-the-go grooming.

Hand Crafted, Swiss Made.

5.25"

entry.title: Hard Cream Pomade by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 20.00

Firm Hold / Soft Finish.

Styling pomade for men's hair. This lightweight and moisture-rich formula provides strong hold without weighing hair down. Natural ingredients provide a soft and natural texture, definition and manageable hold for hours.

INGREDIENTS

Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Water (Aqua), Lanolin Wax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-8 Beeswax, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-40, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Triethanolamine, Tribehenin, Glyceryl Behenate, Fragrance (Parfum), Carbomer, Ceteareth-25, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polycrylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Tridaceth-6, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Camellia Oleifera Leaf (Green Tea) Extract, Bamusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Extract, Yellow 6 (CI#15985), Red 4 (CI#14700).

Size

2 oz. / 60 ml.

entry.title: Silver Tip Shave Brush by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 90.00

100% Natural Badger brush made with fine SILVER TIP hair, soft and durable. Badger hair has a great ability to retain water,which helps create a lather when mixed with a shave cream. This lather improves the barrier between the razor and skin, lifting facial hair to ensure a smoother shave with less irritation.

Usage

  • First, cleanse facial skin.
  • Rinse the brush in warm water, shake off excess water, and apply Super Close Shave Formula to the top of the badger brush.
  • Work the cream into beard, using oblique brush strokes.
  • For more lather, dip the tip of the brush in water and add more shave cream.
  • 100% Natural Badger brush
  • MADE IN GERMANY.
    		•

entry.title: Invigorating Body Wash by Baxter: Flora Cassis
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 15.00

Hydrating shower gel for men, with Flora and Cassis essence.
Washes away dirt and debris from the body without stripping skin of moisture. Mild cleansers and skin-softening agents keep skin smooth and soft.

Usage
  • Gently massage on to wet skin to create mild foam.
  • Rinse thoroughly.
  • For all skin types.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Dodecyl Sodium Sulfate (Plant Derived), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Plant Derived), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Fragrance (Parfum), Octoxynol-9, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides, PEG-150 Distearate, Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Lauramide MEA, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Chloride (Natural Salt), Polyquaternium-7, Methylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Propylparaben, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Ethylhexylglycerin (Preservative), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Triethyl Citrate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyquaternium-11, Benzophenone-4 (Sulisobenzone), PEG-200 Hydrogentated Glyceryl Palmitate, Citric Acid (Naturally Derived), Red 33 (CI#17200), Blue 1 (CI#42090)

     

    Size

    10 oz. / 300 ml.

entry.title: Daily Face Wash by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 15.00

Coconut-derived mild facial cleanser for men.

Gentle, fragrance-free men's face wash leaves skin looking refreshed and smooth, with soothing aloe vera and ginseng. The coconut-derived cleanser removes excess oil and dirt without stripping away vital moisture. Fragrance-free and suitable for all skin types.

10 oz / 300 ml

Ingredients 

 

Water (Aqua), Cetyl Alcohol, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Acrylates Copolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citric Acid, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Propylene Glycol, Stearyl Alcohol, Triethanolamine, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Methylparaben,Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben.

entry.title: Hard Water Pomade by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 18.00

Firm Hold / Shine Finish. Styling pomade for men’s hair.

Designed to easily blend into and rinse out of hair, this water-based, firm-hold styling formula provides dimension and textured separation without the stiffness. It's enhanced with elastic fibers to define hairstyle and supply all-day control.

Usage

  • Rub a small amount of pomade into the palm of your hand and apply to damp or dry hair. Use more product for increased hold and style.
  • Applying product to wet hair will provide more of a wet-look finish. Applications to dry hair will give less definition, but more of a matte-natural look.
  • The Baxter pomade series can be mixed and matched to achieve a multitude of hair options and solutions.

    • Ingredients

    Water (Aqua), Oleth-20, Glycerin, DEA-Oleth-3 Phosphate, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Isosteareth-20, Propylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, VP/VA Copolymer, Ozokerite, Glycol Stearate, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Acetylated Lanolin, Benzophenone-4, Methyl Gluceth-20, PEG-45M, Sodium Polystyrene Sulfonate, VP/Dimethylaminoethylmethacrylate Copolymer, Methylparaben, Potassium Sorbate, Propylparaben, Fragrance(Parfum), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 33 (CI 17200), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica (CI 77019).

    Size

    2 oz. / 60 ml.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 15.00

Nutrient-enriched conditioner for men featuring a mild mint scent.

Restores moisture as it helps rebuild the hair with protein-packed formula. Botanicals and vitamins promote hair manageability, counteract dryness and add natural shine--without weighing hair down. Use with our Daily Protein Shampoo.

10 oz / 300 ml

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Benzophenone-4, Biotin, Ceteareth-20, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Extract, Citric Acid, Hair Keratin Amino Acids, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Niacin, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Panthenol,Propylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride , Sorbitol, Stearalkonium Chloride, Ubiquinone, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Yucca Schidigera Extract, DMDM Hydantoin, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Methylparaben,Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).

entry.title: Daily Protein Shampoo by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 14.00

Nutrient enriched shampoo for men. Mild mint scent.
    Protein and nutrients promote hair strength, body, and manageability. The gentle formula removes buildup, and natural toxins like DHT, a male hormone found to be harmful to the hair's growth cycle.

      Usage

    • Apply throughout hair, massaging into the scalp.
    • Rinse thoroughly; repeat if necessary.

      • Ingredients

      Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Extract, Citric Acid, Cocamide DEA, Glycol Distearate, Hair Keratin Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Menthol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Panthenol, PEG-150 Distearate, PEG-45M, Polyquaternium-4, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Wheat Amino Acids, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone,Methylparaben.

       

      Size

Plant-based hydration technology absorbs quickly to restore the skin’s moisture barrier, leaving skin feeling smooth and refreshed with a shine-free matte finish.

entry.title: Super Close Shave Formula by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 16.00

Hydrating shave cream for men. Easy glide, soothing formula.
Provides a protective cushion between the skin and razor for a close shave without redness or irritation. Antiseptic and botanical extracts refresh and soothe skin.

Allure Best of Beauty Award

Usage

  • Apply cream to clean, wet skin.
  • Rinse blade often under warm water.
  • Application with badger shave brush recommended.
  • Mild-lather formula.

    • Ingrediants

    Water (Aqua), Stearic Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Triethanolamine, BHT,Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil,Menthol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Zinc Stearate, Butylparaben, DMDM Hydantoin, Ethylparaben, Isobutylparaben,Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben.

    Size

    8 oz. / 250 ml.

entry.title: Clay Pomade by Baxter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baxter
Type: Grooming
Price: 20.00

  • Firm Hold / Matte Finish. Styling clay for men’s hair.
  • Hair does exactly what you want it to with this matte-finish balm that separates, defines and molds styles. Infused with natural ingredients such as clay and beeswax, the texturizing formula has a strong, pliable hold that works for any style.

Men's Health Grooming Award for Best Styling Product

Details Reader's Choice Award for Best Hair Wax

Usage

  • Rub a small amount of pomade into the palm of your hand and apply to damp or dry hair.
  • Applying product to wet hair will provide more of a wet-look finish. Applying to dry hair will give less definition, but more of a matte-natural look.
  • Use more product for increased hold and style.
  • The Baxter pomade series can be mixed and matched to achieve a multitude of hair options and solutions.


    • Ingredients

entry.title: Mojave Cabin Spray by Juniper Ridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juniper Ridge
Type: Grooming
Price: 40.00

California desert mountains in a 2 ounce bottle. Fragrance distilled from plants, conifers, bark, moss, mushrooms, and other things found hiking in the Inyo backcountry. Our Mojave scent was formally called Inyo.

Crafted in small batches using steam-distillation, enfleurage, tincture, and infusion.

Spray once or twice to bring the backcountry indoors for several hours. Because it's made entirely from real plants and trees, our Cabin Spray will never overstay its welcome.


Our brand look has taken a bold step forward. We've liberated ourselves with style elements that get to the core of our story. The new glass bottles and the external packaging, both of which are covered in the trail paintings of our own Chief Storyteller, Obi Kaufmann, and the wooden cap on each of our Backpacker Colognes and Trail Soaps are hand carved in our Oakland workshop.

Ingredients: Organic sugar cane alcohol; 100% natural fragrance: tree pitch, plant sap/juice, steam-distilled essential oils.

entry.title: Siskiyou Trail Crew Soap by Juniper Ridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Juniper Ridge
Type: Grooming
Price: 35.00

Transform your shower into a Oregon coastal spa. Fragrance distilled from plants, bark, moss, mushrooms, and other things found hiking in the Oregon backcountry.

Crafted in small batches using steam-distillation, enfleurage, tincture, and infusion.

Pour a quarter-sized portion into your hands; lather with water. Works great as a hand soap, body wash, or an all-purpose camping soap. Unlike bar soaps, which can get mucky, our Trail Crew Soaps do well sink-side and in showers.

8 ounces

Our brand look has taken a bold step forward. We've liberated ourselves with style elements that get to the core of our story. The new bottles and the external packaging, both of which are covered in the trail paintings of our own Chief Storyteller, Obi Kaufmann, and the wooden cap on each of our Backpacker Colognes and Trail Soaps are hand carved in our Oakland workshop.

Ingredients: Saponified organic coconut, olive and jojoba oils; 100% natural fragrance - tree pitch, plant sap / juice, steam-distilled essential oils.
